Header: Lal Kantha to be produced before court today
Content: Police arrested K D Lal Kantha, member of the JVP Political Bureau and former MP over a vehicular accident in Anuradhapura yesterday. Police said Lal Kantha hit a motorcycle head-on while driving his cab near the Anuradhapura Prison on the Anuradhapura-Kurunegala road. K D Lal Kantha will be produced before the Anuradapura Magistates today. Preliminary investigations revealed that K D Lal Kantha was under the influence at the time of the accident. A woman and a girl riding on the motorcycle have been injured in the accident and admitted to the Anuradhapura hospital.
